definitions.definition: (of a place, situation, person, etc) In a disorderly state; chaotic; disorderly.
definitions.example: Jim ran his fingers through his messy brown hair.

definitions.definition: (of a person) Prone to causing mess.
definitions.example: He is the messiest person I've ever met.

definitions.definition: (of a situation) Difficult or unpleasant to deal with.
